alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 27 at 9:58PM PDT until October 28 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, Northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts o 45 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 11 PM PDT Saturday. For the High Wind Warning, from 11 PM Saturday to 10 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
